titleStmt.title: Letters and papers concerning some matters in the last Parliament relating to the commou [sic] rights of all the Commnns [sic] of England, fit to be considered in the next, and by all the said Commons in the mean time.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

titleStmt.title: Letters and papers concerning some matters in the last Parliament relating to the commou [sic] rights of all the Commnns [sic] of England, fit to be considered in the next, and by all the said Commons in the mean time.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: The letters are signed: Edward Stephens.
The last numbered part bears the colophon: printed in the year 1701. The [4] p. at end are dated: June 19. 1704. There is a MS. date of: 17 Apr. 1705.
Imperfect; text incomplete, catchwords on p. [4] of unpaginated sequence: A second.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
